Ice::

She tried again. She concentrated on the paper that fell on the 
floor. She closed her eyes and saw the paper in her mind. Then she 
opened her eyes and stared at the paper.  The piece of paper slowly 
rose and went up to the top of the console, then slowly lowered and 
rested on the console.  Ice smiled and couldn't help but chuckle.
